text: @FLOTUS @BillLeeTN @LaunchTN It would be an honor that @FLOTUS and Gov @BillLeTN have a productive discussion regarding their #COVID19 Child Wellbeing Task Force, the priorities of #BeBest  & the remarkable impact @LaunchTN has had on #Tennessee, including it's contribution to addressing mental health issues
